text:
There's so much to do on this island that
I need a twin. What the? I know, weird right.

You asked for a double and here I am. So I'm
thinking you go and do your risk-taking, travel

junkie thing, adventure, and I'll do the food
and culture. I love food and adventure too.

I know! You're me, I'm you, duh! But, shouldn't
we morf back into each other? You know, two

for one flight? I like your thinking. So,
just say my name three times when you get

to Curacao, you know like Beatle Juice the
movie? And I'll be there! I love that movie.
See you there! Great hair by the way.

I've finally arrived in Curacao. Kristen,
Kristen, Kristen you lucky duck. Oh, yeah

the whole say your name three times thing.
Well, welcome to paradise. Ready to go and
explore? Let's go!

Taking adventure of wide range of water activities
in Curacao is a must. I decided to jump right
into the island's adventurous side....literally!

I'm at Windsurfing Curacao, and I'm going
to try wind surfing for the first time. Wish

me luck! I think I'll probably fall a few
times, but hey maybe not.

I have been rescued. That is how horrible
I am. FAIL!

Travelling around Curacao is also about taking
it slow, relaxing back and soaking up the

rich culture and of course endulging in the
delicious cuisine.

I'm about to try what's called Guiambo. It's
a traditional dish here in in Curacao. It's

Guiambo, which is actually okra, so it's a
vegetable. It's mixed with some fish and vegetables.

I also have Funchi which is polenta. They
say you can't have Guiambo without Funghi.

I've got both here, and I'm going to give
it a try. The texture is very interesting.

It's slimy, but tastes delicious. It's salty
and sweet.

I'm going to try iguana. I've never tried
it before because this is the only place to

try it. I've heard it's an afrodisiac, so
we will see how that goes later on. Boys.
Girls. Whatever! Tastes like chicken.

We've got some green rum here. This is the
only place in the world you can get it. This
man over here makes it. Salut!

Here in Curacao, you can tell that they really
embrace the womanly figure. The voluptuousness.

As you can see here, these little statues
has big bosoms and a matching booty. I like
that.

The people of Curacao sure know how to dance
and have an excellent taste in music.

Most of all the people of Curacao are beautiful
on the outside and the inside.

This Caribbean island is a little treasure
for a lot for you to discover, so pack your
bags and stay a while.

There's one more must I have to do on this
island. I have to stay at the best accommodations.

The Santa Barbara Beach and Golf Resort. I'll
stay there. No Ill do it. I brought you here.

I'll do it. I want to do it. Give it to me!
I guess we can both stay.
I

never want to leave this place. It's definitely
paradise. Cheers!
